Pre-Game Insights: India has a formidable squad and will enter the match as favourites.
USA has already staged an upset once in the T20 World Cup 2024 and is looking in good form.
The Men in Blue have managed to win both their games so far and will be hoping to extend the streak when they lock horns with co-hosts USA next in New York.
USA shocked the world when they managed to defeat Pakistan after having won against neighbours Canada in the tournament opener.
The New York pitch has come under scrutiny for being below par and the groundsmen have been busy on this pitch, removing any grassy areas to try and make it a bit more batter-friendly.
The match will take place during daytime (local time) and the maximum temperature is expected to be around 25°C with no serious threat of rain.
